messages.subject: Re: Reply to Susan/Working
messages.msgSnippet: Do you run into any problems with child labor laws? Mary Ellen The darn trouble with cleaning the house is it gets dirty the next day anyway, so skip a week if
messages.messageBody:
Do you run into any problems with child labor laws?
Mary Ellen
The darn trouble with cleaning the house is it gets dirty the next day
anyway,
so skip a week if you have to. The children are the most important
thing.
--Barbara Bush

messages.subject: Reply to Susan/Working
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Susan, I manage to work full time thanks to a wonderful family business. It involves three generations including my three 17,12, &10yo. My parents have
messages.messageBody:
Hi Susan,
I manage to work full time thanks to a wonderful family business. It
involves three generations including my three 17,12, &10yo.
My parents have always been self-employed due to my fathers diabetes.
They needed help back in 1994 and I needed a break from the rat race of
life! It's still lots of hard work but the reward of not just "being
with" but learning/teaching/playing/working with my children is a
wonderful trade-off for me! Aleasa
